data.actual_result: User icons cover up the voice channel name
data.expected_result: User icons either condense in the space, or ellipse the voice channel name
data.short_description: User icons cover up Voice Channel name when too many users are talking
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel with at least 6 other users - Have everyone talking or transmitting sound at the same time (Must have at least 7 users to do this) - Observe the user icons in the voice channel drawer
